wizard.progress_caption: Complete every step to unlock modeling.

trip_basics.label: Trip basics
trip_basics.description: Capture traveler profile, loyalty status, and cabin context.

experience.label: Onboard experience
experience.description: Score each inflight touchpoint from 0 (not applicable) to 5 (delighted).

operations.label: Ops & service
operations.description: Track delays and ground services that shape satisfaction.

wizard.lift_help: Positive lift means this traveler is more likely to be satisfied than the historic average.
wizard.drivers_explainer: We blend logistic-regression coefficients with deviations from survey medians to estimate influence.
wizard.progress_help: Use Next/Back to move between sections.
wizard.responses_help: Review or copy the structured answers captured so far.
wizard.why_drivers: We project influence by blending logistic-regression coefficients with how far each response deviates from the survey median.
wizard.model_chart_title: How each model scored this traveler
wizard.model_chart_help: Bars reflect the predicted satisfaction probability, sorted from most optimistic to least.

analytics.title: Insights & diagnostics
analytics.comparison_help: Select multiple pipelines to compare headline metrics side by side.
analytics.global_table_empty: Train models to see feature rankings.
data_dictionary_lines: Service sliders use a 0-5 Likert scale where 5 = delighted.
Cabin class options follow airline inventory: Business, Eco, Eco Plus.
Satisfaction label is binary: 1 = satisfied, 0 = neutral/dissatisfied.
analytics.metrics_help: Accuracy/precision/recall/F1/R² reflect the selected holdout dataset.
analytics.global_help: Normalized impacts aggregate top weights across every trained model.

messages.registry_missing: Model registry missing. Run src/models/train_models.py first.
messages.scoring_error: Unable to score—no models were loaded.
messages.no_models: No trained models loaded. Train them first.

next_best_action.success: Celebrate the advocate—surprise-and-delight perks or loyalty nudges will reinforce satisfaction.
next_best_action.info: Solid but fragile sentiment—reinforce digital touchpoints and follow up with a post-trip survey.
next_best_action.warning: High churn risk—trigger service recovery workflow and contact the passenger proactively.

gate_location.label: Gate location

baggage_handling.label: Baggage handling
baggage_handling.help: Speed and accuracy of baggage delivery.

templates.service: {severity} drag on **{feature}** ({value}/5). Invest in coaching, staffing, or product tweaks to lift this touchpoint.
templates.delay: {severity} delay risk: **{feature}** at {value} min. Align ops control and gate teams to reduce turnaround times.
templates.segment: {severity} friction for **{feature} = {value}**. Adjust targeting or perks for this traveler segment.
templates.gender: {severity} sentiment gap detected across gender expression ({value}). Ensure comms and service scripts stay inclusive.
templates.generic: {severity} headwind on **{feature}** (response: {value}). Review qualitative feedback to diagnose root causes.

suggestions.recovery_action: Activate service-recovery playbook (personal outreach, vouchers, proactive updates).
suggestions.promoter_action: Leverage promoter energy—invite the traveler to referral or loyalty-upgrade campaigns.
suggestions.no_action: Maintain current service blueprint—passenger signaled no urgent friction points.
